dcterms:creator: H. B. Kim
H. Zhao
D. Morris
T. T. Um
J. Wang
Y. Hu
J. Shi
dcterms:description: A dataset containing sensor information of 34 therapeutic activities used for exercise therapy in Parkinson's patients, collected from healthy individuals. Each complex activity is divided into several simpler activities, which aids in data generation and classification.
dcterms:title: Therapeutic Activities Dataset

dcterms:description: A novel dataset generated by the authors using a GAN model to synthesize multi-axial sensor data for therapeutic activities.
dcterms:title: TheraGAN Dataset
